text: American Samoa Democratic Party is the American Samoa affiliate of the U.S. Democratic Party. It is based in the territorial capital of Pago Pago. == Democratic caucus == === 2020 === The 2020 American Samoa Democratic presidential caucuses, took place on March 3, 2020. Candidate and co-founder Bloomberg L.P. Michael Bloomberg won with 50% of the votes. 2020 American Samoa Democratic caucuses Candidate Votes % Delegates Michael Bloomberg 175 49.86 4 Tulsi Gabbard 103 29.34 2 Bernie Sanders 37 10.54 rowspan="4" Joe Biden 31 8.83 Elizabeth Warren 5 1.42 Uncommitted 0 0.00 Total 351 100% 6 === 2024 === The 2024 American Samoa Democratic presidential caucuses, took place on March 5, 2024, candidate Jason Palmer surprisingly defeated incumbent president Joe Biden by a margin of 56.0%, but both gets 3 delegates. title: American Samoa Democratic Party
